title: Success!
p1: You have successfully requested a booking for <1>{{count}} cat</1> with <3>{{host}}</3> during the dates of <5>{{checkin}}</5> until <7>{{checkout}}</7>.
p1_plural: You have successfully requested a booking for <1>{{count}} cats</1> with <3>{{host}}</3> during the dates of <5>{{checkin}}</5> until <7>{{checkout}}</7>.
p2: <0>{{host}}</0> now has 3 days to accept or decline your request. We will let you know by email. Questions? Check out our <2>FAQ</2>.
